12925.<pc>の 持っている\n『超天遊戯－弐の書－』が 光り始めた！:
The copy of "Chosen's Teachings Book 2" in
your possession begins to glow!

12926.白紙だったページに 文字が浮かびあがってくる。\n<pc>は その文字を読んだ。:
The blank pages are now filled with words.
<pc> began reading them.

12927.見つけられてしもうたか。くやしいのう……。\nまあ よいわ。見つけた ほうびに\:
Looks like you found it. What a shame... I'll
just have to give you a tough lesson to make
up for it.

12928.ためるを使って テンションを上げた状態で\n<%sEV_QUE_NAME0> <:
Use Psyche Up to raise your tension, then
defeat <%dEV_QUE_T_NUM0> Terror Tabbies! They are outside
of this tower, in Windmill Way.

12929.前にも書いたが とどめをさしたら\nその戦いから 逃げたり 負けたりせんように。:
As I have written before, once you deal the
finishing blow, do not run away or lose the
fight. You have to win, got it?

12930.「こちらにいたのですか ヤーン様……。\n 探すのに 骨が折れましたよ。:
There you are, Master Yarn... I have been
looking for you.

12931.「ん～？ 言わなかったっけ オレ。\n この町で 修行をやるって～。:
Hm? Didn't I tell you I was going to be
training in this town?

12932.「この方は どなたですか？\n はじめて見る方のようですが……。:
Who is this person? I have not seen them
before...

12933.「この町で知り合った ダチの <pc>だ。\n コイツも武闘家なんで 話が合っち:
This is my friend <pc>, who I met in
this town. They're also a martial artist, so
we get along really well.

12934.「ご友人……ですか。そんなものを作るとは\n ずいぶんと 余裕が おありのようで:
A friend...? You seem to have a lot of free
time on your hands to be able to do something
like making friends.

12935.「いいじゃねえかよ～ そのくらい。\n 今まで 修行ばっかりで 友だちを\n 作:
Shouldn't you be happy for me? I've spent so
much time training, that I never had the
chance to make friends until now.

12936.「そんな話はいいんだよ。\n それより 例のモノは\n 持ってきてくれたんだろう:
But we're getting off-track. Did you get that
thing for me?

12937.「ええ。言いつけのとおり\n 超天遊戯の参の書を お持ちしました。:
Yes. As you requested, I have brought you
"Chosen's Teachings Book 3".

12938.「お～っ ありがとよ。参の書は受け取ったぜ。\n ほら 用が済んだら さっさと帰:
Oh, thanks a lot. We're done here, so you can
leave now.

12940.「ああ～。アイツは ガウラドっていうんだ。\n 昔っから オレの世話をしてくれて:
Ah... That guy was Gaurad. He's taken care of
me for a long time. He may look rough, but
he's a good person.

12942.「修行を果たした ごほうびをあげなきゃな。\n この装備は アンタに似合うと思う:
I have to reward you for your hard training.
Here, I think this gear will suit you.

12943.「修行を果たした ごほうびをあげなきゃな。\n えんりょせずに 受け取ってくれ～:
I have to reward you for your hard training.
Go on, take it.

12944.「……とまあ～ こうして 参の書も\n 手に入ったわけなんだが～。\n もちろん:
...So now I've got my hands on the next book.
You will be continuing your training, right,
<pc>?

12945.「ざっと見たところ 次の修行も\n アンタなら なんとか なるんじゃないかと\n:
From a quick glance, I think you can handle
the next lesson, too.

12946.「すぐにやれとは 言わね～さ。\n こういうのは タイミングが重要なんだ。\n:
I'm not saying you have to do it right away.
Timing is everything. Don't forget to come
back later as a martial artist!

12947.「もう少し……。もう少しだ。\n アイツなら この本の修行も\n きっと 超える:
Just a little more... I'm sure they'll be able
to complete the training in this book.
